site_group.physical_address: Site is located in Marianridge at the Telkom Exchange.

m1-1.tower_external_surface_remark: Minor paint failure on mast external surface.
m1-1.tower_external_surface_corrective_action: Monitor paint coating in the next cycle.

m1-2.tower_internal_surface_galv_remark: Moderate white corrosion on tower structure.
m1-2.tower_internal_surface_galv_corrective_a: White corrosion detected must be brush removed to clear surface and painted in accordance with approved procedure using approved corrosion protective paint.

m1-3.tower_internal_lights_remark: Mast internal lights are out of order.
m1-3.tower_internal_lights_corrective_action: Internal lights must be repaired to ensure adequate visibility inside the tower for safe working of personnel.

m1-4.cable_entries_corrective_action: Cable entries must be sealed when not in use to prevent birds from entering the mast.
